mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Miley, Michael, 1841-1918
mdRecord.dcterms:description: This picture is a portrait of a young girl in the Brown family. She is standing in a chair. The glass plate negative was inscribed with Mrs. J. P. Brown. This print was made from the original glass plate negative, which is housed at Virginia Historical Society.
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Portrait of Young Girl in Brown Family (photograph)
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Portrait photography
Virginia -- Rockbridge County
Twentieth century
